alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 5:31AM AKST until January 22 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Visibility will be on half mile or less at times. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches are expected. * WHERE...Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...6 AM Thursday to 6 AM Saturday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds gusting to 45 mph will cause blowing and drifting snow over Dalton Highway Summits. Large snow drifts will form. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
